title: Cathedral-top Sheraton armchair, one of a pair
description: Armchair, one of a pair, Sheraton style. Square open back, occupied by four slender fluted uprights terminating at top in fan-shaped carvings, making pointed arches; the so-called \'cathedral\' top. Oblong crest at center of crest rail. Arms flare outward slightly, and are set back from front of seat. Tapering front legs are fluted and terminate in spade feet. Rear legs plain. Seat slightly serpentine, covered woth green satin.
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
